content: tucked away scarf by maple & fleece looking for a classic simple everyday scarf pattern this cozy scarf features classic 2x2 ribbing on both ends with a smooth stockinette body perfect for showcasing your yarn and adding subtle texture this pattern is perfect for a beginning knitter or anyone wanting the perfect everyday scarf with a classic look 2025 amanda yates yates@mapleandfleece com 1 details tucked away scarf sizes one size yarn fingering weight suggested yarn purl soho good wool or linen quill suggested needles size 3 notions tapestry needle scissors one 1 button glossary abbreviations bobble - bind off co cast on k knit p purl rs right side ws wrong side sl1 slip one stitch 2025 amanda yates 2 notes tucked away scarf this pattern was inspired by wanting a project of a simple knit that i can wear everyday in vermont i wear scarves and shawls most days from october through march but find myself spending time throughout the day tucking the ends in to achieve the look i m going for for the tucked away scarf i designed the pattern to have a classic 2x2 rib on the each end a stockinette main body and a button cuff or two that can be used to hold your scarf in the design you set and to stay as you move about your day you are able to modify the scarf to be knit without the cuff or add another cuff so there is one on each side you can also lengthen the ribbing or the main body to your desired length 2025 amanda yates 3 directions 1 cast on co 30 stitches using the long-tail cast on 2 ribbing section beginning work in 2x2 ribbing k2 p2 across the row slip the first stitch of every row for a neat edge continue until ribbing measures 10 inches 3 stockinette body begin stockinette stitch rs row slip the first stitch purlwise with the yarn in back then knit the rest of the row ws row slip the first stitch purlwise with the yarn in front then purl the rest of the row continue until the scarf measures 30 inches from the end of the 2x2 ribbing 4 ribbing section end resume 2x2 ribbing continuing to slip the first stitch of each row work until this section measures 10 inches the total length of the scarf should now be 50 inches 5 bind off bobble using this method or any method you prefer knit 2 stitches pass the first stitch on the right needle over the second and off the needle you have cast off 1 stitch continue knitting 1 stitch and passing the previous over and off the needle until all stitches are bound off cut yarn leaving a 4-inch tail and pull through last stitch button cuff instructions 1 cast on co 28 stitches using the long-tail cast on 2 stockinette section work 6 row in stockinette as above slipping the first stitch of each row rs
